name: Solvaris Divine Architecture
desc: A unification of the Solvaris grid, photonic, and doctrinal systems. Increases weapon range by %s and beam damage by %s. Improves flux dissipation by %s and reduces energy damage taken by %s. Expands all weapon ammunition magazines by %s while reinforcing shield emitters and logistical sub-routines.
short: Unified Solvaris Core: Boosts Range, Beams, Flux, Defense, and Ammo.

name: Primodial Core
desc: The vessel's biological architecture is governed by an ancient evolutionary algorithm. Grants a %s increase to weapon range and accelerates the ship's temporal flow by %s. The living hull regenerates %s of its maximum armor per minute and autonomously reconnects severed neural pathways to repair disabled weapons. Includes a synaptic autoloader that regenerates ammunition for small missile mounts. Features %s combat logic that dynamically shifts the organism's biological output between aggression, evasion, and stabilization based on immediate threat levels.
short: Doubles weapon range, accelerates time flow, regenerates hull/armor, reloads small missiles, and utilizes adaptive combat logic.
